scripts.db:wipe: rm -f data/clawcounsel.db && rm -rf ../openclaw/workspace/documents/*.txt && echo 'DB wiped. Restart dev server for fresh tables.'
scripts.db:summary: sqlite3 -header -column data/clawcounsel.db "SELECT '--- AGENTS ---' as _; SELECT id, company_name, agent_codename, status FROM agents; SELECT '--- DOCUMENTS ---' as _; SELECT name, type, length(content) as chars FROM documents; SELECT '--- ONBOARDING ---' as _; SELECT agent_id, industry, legal_concerns FROM onboarding_data; SELECT '--- CONVERSATIONS ---' as _; SELECT count(*) as total FROM conversations; SELECT '--- ALERTS ---' as _; SELECT count(*) as total FROM alerts;"
